alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lafourche; Plaquemines; St. Charles (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 3:12PM CDT until June 20 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern St. Charles Parish in southeastern Louisiana... East central Lafourche Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northern Jefferson Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Western Plaquemines Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 312 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Estelle, or near Marrero, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Avondale, Marrero, Hahnville, Harvey, Belle Chasse, Harahan, Westwego, Jean Lafitte, Luling, Myrtle Grove, Ama, Destrehan, Estelle, St. Rose, Woodmere, Norco, Lafitte, Bridge City, Waggaman and Barataria. This includes Interstate 310 between mile markers 3 and 8. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
